line_1: And I was just dancing the Hay round the Chairs,
line_2: So while they were playing their musical Airs,

line_1: And I was just dancing the Hay round the Chairs,
line_2: He roar'd to his Frenchman to kick them down Stairs.
Plays, Concerts, Tea, Negus, and Prayers.

line_1: The vintage-baskets serve, revers'd, for chairs,
line_2: And the gay meal is crown'd with tuneless airs.
